Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the north side of the Avatar Ruins, walking along Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: The mysterious Avatar Ruins, located to the south of the road, is said to be the site of a massive meeting of a number of avatars fighting for control of the lands and its people. The result being massive destruction of just about all the lands. It is said that this battle created the oceans, which previously did not exist. The water is salty because of the blood spilled by the avatars.
